CustomField.description: If the field type has been selected as a optional, this field provides the values of the available check-boxes. Must be separated by a comma (,) only. Do not use a comma within a field value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the field type has been selected as a optional, this field provides the values of the available check-boxes. Must be separated by a comma (,) only. Do not use a comma within a field value.
CustomField.label: Option Values
